comment: Nice event, everyone had so much fun and the music was great
This event is perfect, it should never had end.
We have such an amazing time dancing and having fun with everyone.
Best Christmas ever I had since I was kid.
Amazing Christmas atmosphere, nice music and best dances I ever had.
This was such I nice idea to get together everyone out of town. I will definitely come back next year.
I danced so much that I couldn't barelly walk the next day. Higly recommend it.
Amazing time with friends. Great dance and wonderful music.
I love dance with this crew, Amazing time here.
I really like how the organizes planned this event. Will always attend it when I'm in town.
Really leanerd a lot of basic techniques that you usually don't see teachers including in them classes.
I always enjoy this class, so much fun and got to know new friends.
